Posts.Content: Currently in watchful waiting status until current PSA doubles. Would love to hear good and bad news from those on Lupron. I have read some people have really bad time with it...little information from those who tolerate it with only limited problems. Just searching so I limit surprises. Thanks
Posts.Title: New here...looking for Lupron info. by those on it.

Posts.Content: Thanks all. I had RP 17 years ago. PSA has just returned at low level, but was doubling each 90 days. Last PSA test showed stability or slight dip! Dip could be lab, although same lab for all tests.
Posts.Title: New here...looking for Lupron info. by those on it.
